import requests, json
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import hash, col, crc32, explode, explode_outer
import pandas as pd

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("launches_data").getOrCreate()

launches_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches"

headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(launches_url).json()

json_rdd = sc.parallelize([json.dumps(record) for record in response])

df_raw = spark.read.json(json_rdd)

df_fail = df_raw.withColumn(
    "failure_reason",  col("failures").getItem(0).reason
).withColumn(
    "failure_time",    col("failures").getItem(0).time
).withColumn(
    "failure_altitude",col("failures").getItem(0).altitude
)
df1 = df_fail.withColumn("core", explode("cores"))
df2 = df1.withColumn("payload_id", explode("payloads"))
df_spark_launches = df2.select(
    "id",
    "flight_number",
    "name",
    "date_utc",
    "rocket",
    "success",
    "details",
    "launchpad",
    col("fairings.reused").alias("fairings_reused"),
    col("fairings.recovered").alias("fairings_recovered"),
    col("fairings.ships").alias("fairings_ships"),
    "payload_id",
    col("core.core").alias("core_id"),
    col("core.flight").alias("core_flight"),
    col("core.gridfins").alias("core_gridfins"),
    col("core.legs").alias("core_legs"),
    col("core.reused").alias("core_reused"),
    col("core.landing_attempt").alias("core_landing_attempt"),
    col("core.landing_success").alias("core_landing_success"),
    col("core.landing_type").alias("core_landing_type"),
    col("core.landpad").alias("core_landpad"),
    "failure_reason",
    "failure_time",
    "failure_altitude"
)

for c in df_spark_launches.columns:
    new_c = c.replace(".", "_").replace(" ", "_").replace("-", "_")
    df_spark_launches = df_spark_launches.withColumnRenamed(c, new_c)

rename_map = {
    'core': 'core_id', 
    'flight': 'core_flight', 
    'gridfins': 'core_grid_fins', 
    'legs': 'core_legs', 
    'reused': 'core_reused', 
    'landing_attempt': 'core_landing_attempt', 
    'landing_success': 'core_landing_success', 
    'landing_type':'core_landing_type', 
    'landpad':'core_landpad',
    'id': 'launch_id',
    'name': 'launch_name',
    'date_utc': 'launch_date_utc',
    'rocket': 'rocket_id',
    'success': 'launch_success',
    'details': 'launch_details',
    'launchpad': 'launchpad_id'
}

def rename_columns(df, mapping):
    for old, new in mapping.items():
        if old in df.columns:
            df = df.withColumnRenamed(old, new)
    return df

df_spark_launches = rename_columns(df_spark_launches, rename_map)

fact_launches = df_spark_launches.withColumns(
    {
        'core_id': crc32('core_id'), 
        'launch_id': crc32('launch_id'), 
        'core_landpad_id': crc32('core_landpad'), 
        'rocket_id': crc32('rocket_id'), 
        'launchpad_id': crc32('launchpad_id'), 
        'payload_id': crc32('payload_id'),
        'fairings_ships_id': crc32('fairings_ships_id')
    }
)
fact_launches = fact_launches.drop("core_landpad")
display(fact_launches)

launchpad_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launchpads"

response = requests.get(launchpad_url)

launchpad_data = response.json()

rdd = spark.sparkContext.parallelize(launchpad_data)

df_dim_launchpads = spark.read.json(rdd)

landpad_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/landpads"
response = requests.get(landpad_url)
landpad_data = response.json()

rdd = spark.sparkContext.parallelize(landpad_data)
df_dim_landpads = spark.read.json(rdd)

rocket_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/rockets"

response = requests.get(rocket_url).json()
#rocket_data = response.json()

#rdd = spark.sparkContext.parallelize(rocket_data)

json_rdd = sc.parallelize([json.dumps(record) for record in response])
df_dim_rockets = spark.read.json(json_rdd)

dim_rockets = df_dim_rockets.select(
    col("id").alias("rocket_id"),
    col("name"),
    col("type"),
    col("active"),
    col("stages"),
    col("boosters"),
    col("cost_per_launch"),
    col("success_rate_pct"),
    col("first_flight"),
    col("country"),
    col("company"),
    col("description")

df_payloads = pd.json_normalize(
    payload_data,
    meta=[
        'id',
        'name',
        'type',
        'reused',
        ['dragon', 'capsule'],
        ['dragon', 'mass_returned_kg'],
        ['dragon', 'flight_time_sec'],
        ['dragon', 'water_landing'],
        ['dragon', 'land_landing'],
        'mass_kg',
        'orbit',
        'reference_system',
        'regtime',
        'longitude',
        'semi_major_axis_km',
        'eccentricity',
        'periapsis_km',
        'apoapsis_km',
        'inclination_deg',
        'period_min',
        'lifespan_years',
        'epoch',
        'mean_motion',
        'raan',
        'arg_of_pericenter',
        'mean_anomaly',
        'id'
    ],
    sep='_',
    errors='ignore'
)

df_dim_payloads = df_payloads.explode('customers').reset_index(drop=True).explode('manufacturers').reset_index(drop=True).explode('nationalities').reset_index(drop=True).explode('norad_ids').reset_index(drop=True)
df_dim_payloads.drop('dragon_manifest', axis=1, inplace=True)
df_dim_payloads.head(20)

df_dim_payloads = df_dim_payloads.drop(columns="dragon_mass_returned_lbs")
df_dim_payloads = df_dim_payloads.drop(columns="mass_lbs")
df_dim_payloads = df_dim_payloads.drop(columns="norad_ids")
df_dim_payloads = df_dim_payloads.drop(columns=["semi_major_axis_km","eccentricity", "epoch", "arg_of_pericenter", "inclination_deg","raan","mean_anomaly","period_min", "mean_motion"])

df2 = df_spark_payloads.select("manufacturers")
df2 = df2.withColumnRenamed("manufacturers", "manufacturer")
df2 = df2.withColumn("id", crc32("manufacturer"))
df2 = df2.select("id", "manufacturer")
df2 = df2.dropna(how="all")
df2 = df2.distinct()

df3 = df_spark_payloads.select("nationalities")
df3 = df3.withColumnRenamed("nationalities", "nationality")
df3 = df3.withColumn("id", crc32("nationality"))
df3 = df3.select("id", "nationality")
df3 = df3.dropna(how="all")
df3 = df3.distinct()
df3.show()

df4 = df_spark_payloads.select("customers")
df4 = df4.withColumnRenamed("customers", "customer")

df4 = df4.withColumn("id", crc32("customer"))
df4 = df4.select("id", "customer")
df4 = df4.dropna(how="all")
df4 = df4.distinct()

df5 = df_spark_payloads.select(
    col("id").alias("payloads_id"),
    crc32(col("manufacturers")).alias("manufacturer_id")
)
df5 = df5.distinct()
display(df5)

df6 = df_spark_payloads.select(
    col("id").alias("payloads_id"),
    crc32(col("customers")).alias("customer_id")
)
df6 = df6.distinct()
display(df6)

df7 = df_spark_payloads.select(
    col("id").alias("payloads_id"),
    crc32(col("nationalities")).alias("nationality_id")
)
df7 = df7.distinct()
display(df7)
